item.title: POTASSIUM
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db14500
DrugCentral: potassium
Synonymous :k | kalium | potasio | potassium metal | potassium, elemental | potassium, metal


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of potassium gene in 1 abstracts.

pmid sentence
22966348 Fiber-shaped particles of potassium octatitanate (TISMO) and granular-shaped micro- and nano-size order particles of titanium dioxide (TiO(2)) were employed (1.5 mg in 0.2 ml saline/mouse).
26023052 The present study was conducted to examine the chronic effects of potassium octatitanate fibers (trade name TISMO; chemical formula K2O·6TiO2) on the mouse lung and thoracic cavity.
27088262 Fiber-shaped particles of potassium octatitanate (tradename TISMO; chemical formula K2 O·6TiO2 ), which are morphologically similar to asbestos particles, were shown to induce severe proliferative reactions in the pleural mesothelium in a previous experiment carried out over 21 weeks.
27245839 We interrogated the predicted targets of these differentially expressed microRNA families in MPM cell lines, and identified KCa1.1, a calcium-activated potassium channel subunit alpha 1 encoded by the KCNMA1 gene, as a target of miR-17-5p.
29932955 Lysosomal destabilization, efflux of cytosolic potassium ions and influx of calcium ions, signals from damaged mitochondria, both translational and post-translational controls, and prion-like polymerization have increasingly clear roles in regulating NLRP3 activation.
31477126 Potassium octatitanate fibers (K2O•8TiO2, POT fibers) are used as an asbestos substitute.
